name: Vegapunk
text:
[Blocker]
[On Play] Look at the top 5 cards of your deck, play up to 1 cost 5 or lower {Scientist} type Character other than "Vegapunk", and place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order, and if your opponent has 2 characters or less, discard 1 card.
[Trigger] Draw 1 card.

effect.text: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck, play up to 1 cost 5 or lower {Scientist} type Character other than "Vegapunk", and place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order, and if your opponent has 2 characters or less, discard 1 card.
